document.docAuthor: Pérez-Hernández, Cisteil X., Zaragoza-Caballero, Santiago & Romo-Galicia, Alberto
document.masterDocTitle: Checklist of net-winged beetles (Coleoptera: Lycidae) from Mexico

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Checklist of net-winged beetles (Coleoptera: Lycidae) from Mexico

subSubSection.paragraph:
